Sample_treatment_protocol_ch1: 50K intestinal epithelial cells were purified by FACS . Genotypes include Vil-CreER;Satb2f/f and Satb2f/f control mice
Sample_extract_protocol_ch1: Nuclei were exacted in ATAC-Resuspension Buffer (RSB, 10 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.4, 10 mM NaCl, 3 mM MgCl2) with 0.1% NP40, 0.1% Tween-20, and 0.01% Digitonin. DNA was fragmented by Netera Tn5 Transposase (Illumina), NEBNext 2x MasterMix to pre-Amplify for 5 cycles and determined the required number of additional cycles by qPCR amplification. The final libraries were size selected (200bp to 800bp, including index) with AMpure beads, Sequencing strategy was on Illumina HiSeq-2000 Pair-end 150 (PE150)
Sample_data_processing: Alignment BAM files for the ATAC-seq were generated with the mm10 reference genome using nf-core pipelines, Narrow peaks were called using standard MACS2., ATAC-seq peak files had regions of less than 1kb from TSS removed using bedtool., Biological replicates were concatenated and sorted, and peaks merged within a maximum distance of 500 bp., Six optimum clusters were determined for k-means clustering using the elbow method. The top 3 clusters were not unique across samples and, therefore, merged into one, according to signal pattern similarity. Cluster 6 was excluded due to very low non-distinct signal., The three resulting clusters were then annotated in R 3.6.0 using the annotatePeak function from the ChIPseeker package using known mm10 genes.

Sample_treatment_protocol_ch1: Live Epcam+, CD45-, and CD31- epithelial cells sorted by SONY MA900. Genotypes include Vil-CreER;Satb2f/f and Satb2f/f control mice
Sample_extract_protocol_ch1: Cells washed with 0.4% BSA in PBS and processed with 10X genomics single cell droplet sample preparation workflow at the Genomics Core facility at Weill Cornell Medicine, Beads-in-Emulsion (GEMs) were transferred and GEMs-RT was undertaken in droplets by PCR incubation. After purification of first-strand cDNA from the post GEM-RT reaction mixture, barcoded and full-length cDNAs were amplified via PCR to for library construction. Enzymatic fragmentation and size selection were used to optimize the cDNA amplicon size. TruSeq Read 1 (read 1 primer sequence) was added during GEM incubation.  A sample index and TruSeq Read 2 (read 2 primer sequence) were added via End Repair, A-tailing, Adaptor Ligation, and PCR
Sample_data_processing: Unique molecular identifiers (UMIs) that barcode each individual mRNA molecule within a cell during reverse transcription were used to remove PCR duplicates., Cells expressing fewer than 1000 or greater than 5500 genes were filtered out to exclude non-cells or cell aggregates. Cells expressing greater than 25 percent mitochondrial related genes were also removed., Seurat standard pipeline was used for normalization and scaling while regressing out mitochondrial and cell cycle variation., The Slingshot algorithm was used to order and project cells into principal curves on a diffusion map projection representing distinct trajectories with the arc length along each principal curve representing pseudotime, denoting a biological development process., For each dataset, differentially expressed genes that were upregulated in each cluster compared to the rest of the cells were identified using Suerat’s implementation of the model-based analysis of single cell transcriptomics (MAST) algorithm., To identify cell types, genes with a Bonferroni-adjusted P<0.001 and log fold change of at least 0.25 were taken into consideration.

Sample_treatment_protocol_ch1: EDTA stripped Lgr5DTRGFP colonic epithelia were dissociated into single cells with TrypLE. Single cells incubated with anti-EPCAM-APC antibody for 30mins on ice. Epcam+ and GFP+ double postive cells were collected as stem cells. Epcam+ and GFP- cells were sorted as differentiated cells. Mutipule mice cells were combined as one sample.
Sample_extract_protocol_ch1: 10x5 cells were attached to Concanavalin A conjugated magnetic beads, permeabilized, and incubated with anti-SATB2 or isotype control antibodies at 4C for overnight. pAG-MNase (1:1000) was added in digitonin buffer to bind with antibodies. Finally, targeted chromatins were digested and released into the supernatant. DNA was purified with a MinElute purification kit., Libraries were prepared using the ThruPLEX DNA-Seq Kit, Exactly followed the protocol from Takara bio (R400665). All final libraries were size selected (200-800 bp) by AMPure XP beads (Beckman, A63880) and loaded for sequencing.
Sample_data_processing: Reads were trimmed with trim_galore., Paired-end reads were then mapped to the mm10 genome using Bowtie2 --local --very-sensitive-local --no-unal --no-mixed --no-discordant --phred33 -I 10 -X 700., Only uniquely mapped reads were retained with samtools, Peaks were called from macs2 with pooled reads and with both replicate samples by merge broad and narrow peak files., only peaks ±2 Kb outside TSSs were permitted, using ‘distal peaks’ as enhancer peaks

Sample_treatment_protocol_ch1: Embryonic hindgut (distal to the cecum) was digested in 0.25% Trypsin-EDTA at 37°C for 30 minutes followed by neutralization with 5%FBS. Cells were incubated with APC-conjugated EpCAM antibody (BioLegend) and FACS-purified on an Aria II SORP flow cytometer (Becton-Dickinson).
Sample_extract_protocol_ch1: Five to Thiry thousand cells were lysed and nuclei extracted in ATAC-Resuspension Buffer (RSB, 10 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.4, 10 mM NaCl, 3 mM MgCl2) with 0.1% NP40, 0.1% Tween-20, and 0.01% Digitonin. DNA was transposed by Nextera Tn5 Transposase (Illumina) for 30min at 37C and purified with QIAquick column (Qiagen), NEBNext 2x MasterMix was used to pre-Amplify transposed DNA for 5 cycles and determine the required number of additional cycles by qPCR amplification. The final libraries were size selected (200bp to 800bp, including index) with AMpure beads, Libraries were sequenced on a NextSeq500 instrument (Ilumina)
Sample_data_processing: 75-bp single-end reads were aligned to mouse reference genome Mm10 using Bowtie2 v2.3.4.3, Nonunique and duplicate reads were removed using SAMtools version 1.9, Bigwig files were generated using the bamCoverage module in deepTools v3.0.2 and normalized for 1x coverage using 10bp bins, smoothened over 30bp.
Sample_growth_protocol_ch1: As described in Banerjee et al, Genes & Dev. 2018. 32: 1430-1442
Adapter removal and trimming: Cutadapt 1.42 with Python 2.7.12. Trimming with Trim Galore version: 0.4.4_dev, trimming mode: single-ended.

Sample_treatment_protocol_ch1: Embryonic hindgut (distal to the cecum) was digested in 0.25% Trypsin-EDTA at 37°C for 30 minutes followed by neutralization with 5%FBS. Cells were incubated with APC-conjugated EpCAM antibody (BioLegend) and FACS-purified on an Aria II SORP flow cytometer (Becton-Dickinson).
Sample_extract_protocol_ch1: Five to Thiry thousand cells were lysed and nuclei extracted in ATAC-Resuspension Buffer (RSB, 10 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.4, 10 mM NaCl, 3 mM MgCl2) with 0.1% NP40, 0.1% Tween-20, and 0.01% Digitonin.
